content: The administration wants clarity -- from the two groups before they approve, first, that's a little bit of the Barnes-Jewish situation, get the clarity, get it resolved, and now have an order for seven systems, and arguably one of the top 10 healthcare systems in the U.S. On the 20 system order from King's College, are there any other large, IDN sort of contractor in the pipeline, which would be in -- something similar to what you're seeing along the lines of King's College of London order?
